Greetings. I am 	 of the San d'Orian Provincial Knights.1�

What can I help you with?Nothing.Performance assessment.New Allied Tags.Temporary items.Union registration.Teleportation.Information on the Allied Campaign.1�
You've already undergone an evaluation for this battle, or had you forgotten?As much as I'd like to, I'm forbidden from providing you with a new set of Allied Taegs until the next battle begins.1�

I am sorry,  , but your campaign medal has expired. I cannot issue tags to anyone not authorized by the Allied Forces. Return to your nation's capital and speak with a Campaign Evaluation Official.1�

Your steadfast efforts have earned you a claim to share in your union's spoils of war.By  �[transferring to another union/resigning from your union], you will relinquish this right.It is not my place to question your decision, but I suggest you pay the matter due heed.1�
�[Transfer unions/Resign from your current union]?No.Yes.1�

Your steadfast efforts have earned you a claim to share in your union's spoils of war.By  �[transferring to another union/resigning from your union], you will relinquish this right.It is not my place to question your decision, but I suggest you pay the matter due heed.1�
�[Transfer unions/Resign from your current union]?No.Yes.1�

I am afraid that all unions are currently at their maximum enrollment, and unable to accept new recruits.For better or for worse, though, I suspect it shall not be long before we are in need of some new blood.Such is the nature of war...1�

Step right up, �[mister/lady]!No, don't tell me: yer lookin' for a Hume broad.1�
'Bout yea tall? Sword on her hip?Sure, I know where she's lyin' low.1�

'Course, I just might be able to make an exception for a friendly �[chap/lady] who brought me 
 	)��������...1�
Whoa now! What's with the cynical stare?Could it be that...<gasp>...you don't trust me?1�
Why, you wound me! Deeply, like.Just because my buddy to the  �[southeast/northwest/north/west] is a two-faced trickster, doesn't mean all us imps are!1�
I'm wounded. Deeply, like.Why, I couldn't tell a lie if ya paid me! Well, depends on how much...1�
Why, you wound me! Deeply, like.Just because my buddy to the  �[southeast/northwest/north/west] is a two-faced trickster, doesn't mean all us imps are!1�
Bah, fine, don't believe me!No skin off my wings.1�
Oh, look...another Allied soldier.How dreadfully exciting.1�
Let me guess: you're searching for someone and need my help.Oh, will the fun ever stop? <Yawn>...1�
Does it look like I'm running a charity here?1�

Bring me 
 	)��������, then we can talk.If I feel like it.1�
Look at that expression on your face.Why, it's as if you don't trust me.1�
Fine. then go see my friend to the  �[east/north] of here.He's as honest as they come.1�
Here's a free tip: don't judge an imp by his cover.My buddy to the  �[southeast/northwest/north/west] talks the talk, but he couldn't tell the truth if his life depended on it.1�
Trust me or don't trust me.I won't lose any sleep over not helpin' a wingless one.1�
Fine. then go see my friend to the  �[east/north] of here.He's as honest as they come.1�
Yeeeeees? You have business with me, you do?1�
You look for Hume woman, hmmmmmm?Maybe I know where she is. Maybe I don't.1�
Either way, too bad!Boss would have Rokke's tail for blabbin' our secrets to a wingless one, seeeeee?1�

Or maybe you make it worth my while?Bring Rokke 
 shiny 	)��������, perhaps?1�
Shiny, shiny #����, yes.Rokke tell you everything he know.1�
What? My buddy up  �[southeast/northwest/north/west] tell you same thing?Oh, don't trust him, no no no.1�

What? My buddy up  �[southeast/northwest/north/west] tell you same thing?Oh, don't trust him, no no no.1�

Well, looky who's back. And with  $����, t' boot.Decided to trust ol' Rikke, did ya?1�
Listen up, then. I'll tell ya all I know about yer Klara lady..........6 And that's all I know.1�
You wingless ones really ain't too bright, are ya?Didn't yer mommy ever tell ya not to trust an imp?1�
Well, looky who's back. And with  $����, t' boot.Decided to trust ol' Rikke, did ya?1�
A shrewd decision, my friend. Astute, even.1�
That Klara lady is lyin' low up aboveIn a corner of the southwest chamber, like.1�
I'd tell ya more, but the boss, he don't let us lackeys get too close.Not even the smart ones like yers truly.1�
Don't blame him, though.If word got out that he was usin' a mortal for his plans, things might get all complicated-like.1�
...And that's all I'm gonna say on the matter.No hard feelings, but I like my wings attached to my body, thankyaverymuch.1�
! Did you truly get one of those shifty little fiends to talk?1�
I bow to your superior interrogation skills.At any rate, we mustn't delay.1�
I'll round up Volker and the others.We rendezvous at the location of which the imp spoke. Be safe,  !1�
You want a pat on the back? A cookie, perhaps?1�
What, you actually thought I'd tell you where the woman is?Maybe I would, if I knew...or cared. Now scram.1�
Am I supposed to give you a round of applause or something?1�
Oh, the Hume woman.Yeah, I saw her up above, in the southwest chamber. Or somewhere around there.1�
I'd tell you more if I knew. Or cared.1�
Beats me why the boss needs a Hume for his plans.If he's having fun, more power to him.1�
You could go see for yourself and leave me alone.That'd be just super.1�
! Did you truly get one of those shifty little fiends to talk?1�
